metadata.description: Binary flag mapping for Phase 2 data quality issues

flag_mapping.1: Contradictory values in the same row: Window Seat=True AND Aisle Seat=True
flag_mapping.2: Status vs operational data conflict: Status='Cancelled' but Arrival Date/Time is present
flag_mapping.8: Negative or impossible numeric values detected

1.description: Contradictory values in the same row: Window Seat=True AND Aisle Seat=True
1.fix_approach: Ensure only one of Window Seat or Aisle Seat is set to True

2.description: Status vs operational data conflict: Status='Cancelled' but Arrival Date/Time is present
2.fix_approach: Review and correct the Status and arrival date inconsistency

4.fix_approach: Ensure departure date/time is before arrival date/time

8.description: Negative or impossible numeric values detected
8.fix_approach: Review and correct the Duration (Hours) values
